definition: Shanghai municipality in southeast China, abbr. 滬|沪
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Shanghai is one of the world’s largest seaports.
sentences.chinese: 上海市世界上最大的港口城市之一。

sentences.english: Expo 010 is organized by Chinese Government, and operated by the city of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海世博會由中國政府主辦上海市承辦。

sentences.english: Located in Xuhui District Shanghai with total floor area of 9,200 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 位於上海市徐彙區，總建築面積約9，200平方米。

sentences.english: Shanghai, known to the world as Oriental Pear, is China's eastern gate to the.
sentences.chinese: 以東方明珠聞名於世的上海市中國通向世界的東大門。

sentences.english: Shanghai Prospers International Trade Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 公司註冊於上海市外高橋保稅區。

sentences.english: The industrial park is located in Shanghai Comprehensive Industrial Development Zone in fengxian district.
sentences.chinese: 本工業園區坐落在奉賢南橋上海市工業綜合開發區內。

sentences.english: It is located in the Sheshan Songjiang district, in the Western outskirts of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 天馬賽車場坐落於上海市西郊的松江區。

sentences.english: And with the CPC Shanghai Municipal FINANCE COMMITTEE.
sentences.chinese: 並設有中共上海市財貿黨校。

sentences.english: Company is located in Jiading District, Shanghai, China, No. 388 Jin Park, eight-way.
sentences.chinese: 公司位於中國上海市嘉定區金園八路388號。

sentences.english: Shanghai NPC vice-director Ren Weiyang with Zheng Yuanbao board chairman.
sentences.chinese: 上海市人大副主任任文燕與鄭元豹董事長。

sentences.english: Going to Zhujiajiao from Shanghai is like travelling back in a time machine.
sentences.chinese: 從上海市區去朱家角就像是坐上時光機器穿越回古代。

sentences.english: Continue obtaining title of Shanghai city infectious disease prevention and cure job advanced individual for 3 years.
sentences.chinese: 連續三年獲上海市傳染病防治工作先進個人的稱號。

sentences.english: Therefore, it raised some proposals for the professionalized development of Shanghai special P. E. teachers.
sentences.chinese: 據此提出上海市特殊體育教師專業化發展建議。

sentences.english: In 1998, the Shanghai Municipal Education Commission launched the second phase of curriculum reform.
sentences.chinese: 1998年，上海市教委啓動了課改二期工程。

sentences.english: The local branch of the state oceanography bureau says the number of red tides being reported each year is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 上海市海洋局說每年赤潮的次數都在增加。

sentences.english: The company was founded in 2009, located in the Jiading District of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 本公司成立於2009年，位於上海市嘉定區。
